sections.heading: acts relating to minors and incompetents
sections.text: No person shall sell, furnish, give away, exchange, or deliver, or permit the sale, gift, or procuring of, any alcoholic liquors to or for any minor or to any person who is mentally incompetent.SourceLaws 1935, c. 116, ยง 38, p. 400;Laws 1937, c. 125, ยง 1, p.
